neighbourHandle

Neighbour handle index

  • -1 - when handle is either available or occluded
  • neighbour object's handle index - when handle is connected

Declaration

Field Value
Type Description
System.Int32

neighbourObject

Neighbour object index

  • -1 - when handle is available
  • index of connected neighbour object - when handle is connected or occluded by another AssemblyObject
